page.title: 11CLUBS-the village of Appleby
page.content: {Appleby United Over 60's Club}meet 2nd Wednesday monthly at the Village Hall. Â£1 per year subscription and 25p per meeting. 26 members. {Village Hall Committee}meet 4th Monday monthly. They raise funds to finance the Village Hall -members elected at the AGM every November. {Womans Institute}meets 2nd Tuesday monthly. 15 members. Â£4.01 per year. {Football Club-Appleby United}play on Village Hall field most Sundays of the season. Colours pale blue and white. {History Club}meet 4th Tuesday monthly Sept]May. No charges-jug collection made periodically. {PCC}meet 2nd Monday monthly. {Appleby Baby Sitting Circle}members sit for each other on a token per hour basis no monetary cost to members. {Parish Council}meet monthly. {Bingo Club}meet Friday weekly.
